content.value: During the evening of Friday October 29th 2021, Blankets for T.O. hosted a paint night for our members and students in the UTSC community. The event was held in a campus lecture hall in the Instructional Centre and we decorated the whole place with ghosts and ghouls for the occasion.

For only a $5 admission ticket, attendees were provided with a wide selection of paints, blank canvases, and brushes that they could use to show off both their breathtaking imagination and artistry. To tie in some nostalgia, we also organized a viewing of Coraline, a creepy 2008 animated classic movie, to fuel the creative juices and dive headfirst into the spooky Halloween spirit. There was an opportunity to also buy some high-quality BTO styled masks and stickers!

(Pictured below: BTO Secretary Nivedita Upadhyay (left) and VP Internal Jessika Krzyzewski (right) pose for a photo at the mask and sticker stand. A mysterious individual with a Ghost face mask looms between them. Scary!)

description.en-US: Image of BTO executives at Halloween paint night 2021

content.value: The event was filled with high energy and fun, with attendees painting all sorts of scary and Halloween-themed images.
We gave attendees the chance to compete for a grand prize given for the best painting of the night
. Decided by our followers on Instagram (
by the way, why don't you follow us over at
?), one member was rewarded the prize for their amazing Coraline-inspired painting. Congrats!
The night concluded with attendees getting a chance to model with their masterpieces (one included below!), and all were given the chance to take home a cool polaroid to remember the evening.

description.en-US: Painting of pumpkins drawn at the Blankets for T.O. Halloween Paint Night 2021

content.value: If you missed out on our spooky Halloween paint night,

Blankets for T.O. has tons of future events planned for our members and UTSC students - be sure to follow us on social media, and subscribe to our email list, to keep up to date with everything we’re up to!
See our socials and contact links here
